name: youtubewordfinder
description: Finds clips of youtubers saying certain words

scripts.dist: npm i youtube-dl && npm run install-ffmpeg-special && npm run build && electron-builder && npm run uninstall-ffmpeg-special
scripts.install-ffmpeg-special: node -e "const os = require('os'); const platform = os.platform(); if (platform === 'darwin') { require('child_process').exec('npm i @ffmpeg-installer/darwin-x64 @ffmpeg-installer/darwin-arm64 --force'); } else if (platform === 'linux') { require('child_process').exec('echo Running on Linux'); } else if (platform === 'win32') { require('child_process').exec('npm i @ffmpeg-installer/win32-x64'); }"
scripts.uninstall-ffmpeg-special: node -e "const os = require('os'); const platform = os.platform(); if (platform === 'darwin') { require('child_process').exec('npm uninstall @ffmpeg-installer/darwin-x64 @ffmpeg-installer/darwin-arm64'); } else if (platform === 'linux') { require('child_process').exec('echo Running on Linux'); } else if (platform === 'win32') { require('child_process').exec('npm uninstall @ffmpeg-installer/win32-x64'); }"

author: Ethan Sarif-Kattan
